inclusion.criterion: multitrauma patients with at least two organ-system injury
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: likelihood that the patient would require mechanical ventilation with an endotracheal tube (or tracheostomy) for >10 days
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy; lactation; immunosuppression; hematologic disease; prosthetic cardiac valve or vascular graft; cardiac trauma; history of rheumatic fever, endocarditis, or congenital cardiac abnormality
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: administration of antibiotics for > 3 days before recruitment into the study
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of infection from Hepatis B or C and HIV
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain. Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells in urine culture.
